dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(pc.hasTraitActivated(PERK_CHUUNI)) Not able to refuse Meraxis's challenge, you quickly reply by exclaiming, [pc.speech(You're no match for my ultimate power! Get ready to suffer defeat!)] #ELSEIF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_meraxis_duel_place_elis)) Deciding to indulge Meraxis, and thinking that you have a decent shot at beating her and putting her in her place, you accept her challenge. #ELSE Deciding to indulge Meraxis, and thinking that the duel should offer you some practice for what you might be about to encounter in the fields, you accept her challenge. #ENDIF

[meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! As expected of my nemesis!)] the chunni [meraxis.race] laughs. Striking a heroic pose, a sinister grin settles on Meraxis's face as she reveals, #IF(flags.hasSavedLong('meraxis_duel_player_losses')) [meraxis.speech(I've got another potion to test on you! If I win, you have to drink it again, ok?! I want to see you transform again...)] #ELSEIF(flags.hasSavedLong('meraxis_duel_player_wins')) [meraxis.speech(You may have won before, but not this time! When I win, you have to drink the potion I've made for you, ok?!)] #ELSE [meraxis.speech(You might not be aware of this, but just like Lilaya my supreme power covers the field of arcane research. My experiments have yielded many potions, and I need to test them on someone. When I win, you have to drink one of my transformative potions, ok?!)] #ENDIF

Not yet agreeing to Meraxis's demands, you ask what you'll get if you win. Letting out another theatrical laugh in response to your question, Meraxis replies, #IF(flags.hasSavedLong('meraxis_duel_player_wins')) [meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! You have no chance of winning this time! I've been training since my last defeat and will surely destroy you! However, to make things interesting, you may decide upon a reward if you were to somehow best me in combat. So go on, choose what it is that you desire!)] #ELSE [meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! You have no chance of winning! However, to make things interesting, you may decide upon a reward if you were to somehow best me in combat. So go on, choose what it is that you desire!)] #ENDIF

Not liking the idea of being transformed if you were to lose the duel, you tell Meraxis that you've had a change of mind and don't want to fight her after all.

[meraxis.speech(Eugh... Fine...)] Meraxis sighs, before pouting at you and asking, [meraxis.speech(If you don't want to fight, then why have you interrupted the tale I was recounting to my minions?)]

Not really being interested in any kind of reward, you tell Meraxis that the satisfaction of beating her will be enough. Letting out another burst of manic laughter, the chuuni [meraxis.race] declares, [meraxis.speech(Mwhahahah! So, you desire no reward at all? Don't think that that will make me go easy on you! I shall swiftly destroy you and then laugh as I transform you! Mwhahaha!)]

Feeling like you could do with an extra bit of cash, you tell Meraxis that if you win she's got to give you all the money she has on her. A look of shocked surprise quickly flashes across her face as she hears you say this, and she blurts out, [meraxis.speech(But that's my allowance from mommy! I-I mean, you dare to act like a common thief?! I shall swiftly destroy you and then laugh as I transform you! Mwhahaha!)]

You respond to Meraxis by stating that as she's planning on transforming you, she has to be prepared for the same. If you win, you say, then she has to permanently transform herself in whatever manner you see fit.

[meraxis.speech(You dare to ask me that?! There's no way I'd agree to that!)] she exclaims in indignation, before pouting and offering a compromise, [meraxis.speech(If you win, you can choose one aspect of me to transform. I'm not going to do anything too extreme, a-and I'm not growing a penis or becoming an incubus, so don't even ask for that!)]

Knowing that she'll never agree to any more than that, you accept Meraxis's offer, to which she laughs and declares, [meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! It doesn't even matter anyway; I shall swiftly destroy you and then laugh as I transform you!)]

Wanting to have some intimate fun with the cute chuuni [meraxis.race], you tell Meraxis that if you win then she has to have sex with you. It takes a moment for our request to fully sink in, and after a moment of looking bewildered, Meraxis's cheeks flush red and she stammers, [meraxis.speech(Y-You want me to do w-what?! S-Sex? You... Why... What?!)]

Repeating your request, you tell Meraxis that she doesn't need to act so shy; #IF(meraxis.getSexCount(pc).getTotalTimesHadSex()>0 && flags.hasSavedLong('meraxis_duel_player_wins')) that she doesn't need to act so shy; after all, the two of you have already done some lewd stuff together. [style.random( #IF(meraxis.hasFetish(FETISH_ANAL_RECEIVING)) Pointedly looking down towards her ass, you remind the shy [meraxis.race] of how much she likes receiving anal attention. #ENDIF | #IF(meraxis.hasFetish(FETISH_VAGINAL_RECEIVING)) Pointedly looking down towards her groin, you remind the shy [meraxis.race] of how much she likes having her pussy used. #ENDIF | #IF(meraxis.hasFetish(FETISH_BREASTS_SELF)) Pointedly looking down towards her chest, you remind the shy [meraxis.race] of how much she likes having her breasts used. #ENDIF )] #ELSE after all, she's [meraxis.a_race] and so should surely be comfortable performing sexual favours. #ENDIF Your words only make Meraxis blush even harder, and she stammers, [meraxis.speech(S-Shut up! Fine, I'll do a small sexual favour for you if you win, just s-stop embarrassing me! I-I mean, It doesn't even matter anyway; I-I shall swiftly destroy you and then laugh as I transform you!)]

Pointing out that your current location is not exactly a suitable place in which to be having a duel, you suggest to Meraxis that the two of you could settle this outside the walls of Elis. Agreeing to your proposal, the chunni [meraxis.race] accompanies you out of the eastern gate, and after [pc.walking] over to a nearby copse of deciduous trees, you're ready to get started.

[meraxis.speech(Prepare to be defeated!)] Meraxis declares. Before you can reply, she then performs some kind of matter-manipulation spell and seemingly pulls her huge scythe from out of mid-air. Pointing the arcane-bladed weapon at you, she lets out a maniacal laugh and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! I shall show you the cosmic powers of the dark siren!)]

As there's nobody around, you determine that your current location is a suitable one in which to carry out your duel. Preparing yourself for combat, you ask Meraxis if she's ready to start.

[meraxis.speech(I'm always ready!)] Meraxis declares, before hefting her scythe and letting out a maniacal laugh, [meraxis.speech(Mwhahaha! I shall show you the cosmic powers of the dark siren!)]

Unable to continue fighting, you signal for Meraxis to stop, before collapsing to the ground and panting for breath. Relishing in her victory, the chuuni [meraxis.race] lets out a smug laugh, before advancing upon you and declaring, [meraxis.speech(You never stood a chance! My ultimate power cannot be matched by anyone! Mwhahaha!)]

Looking up, you see that Meraxis is holding a bottle of transformative fluid, and after removing the cap she teases, [meraxis.speech(You ready for this? Remember, you agreed to drink it before we started the duel!)]

#IF(!pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true)) Although your mouth is blocked by sealed clothing, this poses no obstacle to Meraxis, who swiftly channels essences into removing their seals. With your mouth now exposed, #ELSE Leaning down, #ENDIF the [meraxis.race] impatiently pushes the neck of the bottle past your [pc.lips+], and after tilting your head back, the transformative fluid starts to flow into your mouth...

With Meraxis continuing to force the bottle into your mouth, you have little option but to swallow the transformative fluid that's flowing out into your mouth. As you gulp down the sickly-sweet concoction, Meraxis takes this opportunity to gloat, [meraxis.speech(How does it feel, my arch-nemesis? To know that I, the dark siren, have not only defeated you, but am also making you transform! Mwhahaha!)]

Swallowing down the last drop, you pull back and take a deep breath, but before you can respond to Meraxis's taunts, you find yourself letting out a shocked gasp as a wave of unnatural warmth starts to spread throughout your body. Smirking at your reaction to the fluid's effects, the triumphant [meraxis.race] stands up and declares, [meraxis.speech(Your body is nothing more than a vessel for my experiments! Now, submit to your transformation!)]

Not wanting to be transformed by Meraxis, you twist your head to one side and spit out the transformative liquid. With the rest of the concoction being spilt all over the ground, the chuuni [meraxis.race] lets out an annoyed cry and shouts, [meraxis.speech(Hey! You agreed to this when you accepted my offer of a duel! What the hell?!)]

Seeming to be quite angry at your refusal to drink her potion, Meraxis stands up and takes a step back, before frowning at you and shouting, [meraxis.speech(You've really let me down, [pc.name]! If you agree to do something, you should actually do it! I can't believe that you wasted my experimental potion like that!)]

After continuing to shout at you in this manner for a few more moments, Meraxis takes a step back and places her hands on her hips, before sighing, [meraxis.speech(I'm disappointed in you, my nemesis!)]

Spinning around on the spot, the chuuni [meraxis.race] strikes a dramatic pose and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(I shall return to the tavern now! There's no hard feelings between us because of this duel, right? Right. Now, witness my power!)]

The strange warmth flowing throughout your body suddenly rises up into your chest, and after letting out another shocked gasp, you look down to see your breasts swelling and growing larger. Despite being the one responsible for creating this potion, Meraxis starts to get a little flustered as she watches your breasts expand and mutters, [meraxis.speech(It's not like I like big breasts or anything... This is just an experiment...)]

With the transformation coming to an abrupt end, you look up to see a blushing Meraxis staring lustfully down at your chest. Before you can say anything about how she seems to be more embarrassed about your transformation than you are, she clears her throat and declares, [meraxis.speech(My experiment is finished, and you've been put in your place, my nemesis! Now you must suffer from having strangers stare at your big boobs! Mwhahaha!)]

The strange warmth flowing throughout your body suddenly drops down into your groin, and after letting out another shocked gasp, you feel your [pc.cock] swelling and growing larger. Despite being the one responsible for creating this potion, Meraxis starts to get a little flustered as she watches #IF(pc.isCoverableAreaVisible(CA_PENIS)) your exposed cock expand #ELSE your bulge expand in size #ENDIF and mutters, [meraxis.speech(It's not like I like big cocks or anything... This is just an experiment...)]

With the transformation coming to an abrupt end, you look up to see a blushing Meraxis staring lustfully down at your groin. Before you can say anything about how she seems to be more embarrassed about your transformation than you are, she clears her throat and declares, [meraxis.speech(My experiment is finished, and you've been put in your place, my nemesis! Now you must suffer from having strangers stare at your big cock! Mwhahaha!)]

The strange warmth flowing throughout your body suddenly increases in intensity, with a particularly noticeable concentration rising up into your chest. After letting out another shocked gasp, you feel your body shifting to look significantly more feminine, before looking down to see your breasts swelling and growing larger. Despite being the one responsible for creating this potion, Meraxis starts to get a little flustered as she watches your breasts expand and mutters, [meraxis.speech(It's not like I like big breasts or anything... This is just an experiment...)]

With the transformation coming to an abrupt end, you look up to see a blushing Meraxis staring lustfully down at your chest. Before you can say anything about how she seems to be more embarrassed about your transformation than you are, she clears her throat and declares, [meraxis.speech(My experiment is finished, and you've been put in your place, my nemesis! Now you must suffer from having strangers stare at your big boobs! Mwhahaha!)]

After continuing to gloat in this manner for a few more moments, Meraxis takes a step back and places her hands on her hips, before revealing, [meraxis.speech(I didn't even need to prove myself by winning that duel; I know that I'm the most powerful! Mwhahaha!)]

Spinning around on the spot, Meraxis strikes a dramatic pose and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(I shall return to the tavern now! There's no hard feelings between us because of this duel, right? Right. Now, witness my power!)]

Sensing that Meraxis is about to show off her knowledge of how to teleport, you quickly say goodbye to her. With her grand exit interrupted by your farewell, Meraxis pouts a little and awkwardly replies, [meraxis.speech(Oh, yes, well, goodbye to you too, [pc.name]. I-I mean, farewell, my nemesis! We shall meet once more at The Red Dragon!)]

With that, Meraxis casts her teleportation spell, and in a flash of purple light she disappears from sight, leaving you with little else to do except continue on your way...

Having been well and truly beaten, Meraxis staggers back and breathlessly pants, [meraxis.speech(No more... Y-You are victorious this day...)]

Having said beforehand that you didn't want any kind of reward for winning the duel, you're content to simply relish in the fact that you were able to defeat Meraxis. Your sense of pride and accomplishment at having beaten so formidable an opponent doesn't last too long however, as Meraxis seems to genuinely be struggling to regain her strength. Worried that you might have gone too far, you ask the exhausted [meraxis.race] if she's ok.

[meraxis.speech(O-Of course I'm ok,)] she replies, before spending the next few moments taking a series of deep breaths. Thankfully after performing this breathing exercise she seems to recover some of her usual spirit, and boisterously declares, [meraxis.speech(You may have triumphed today, my nemesis, but next time you shall surely lose! Now listen to what I have to say...)]

Doing as you're asked, you listen as Meraxis places her hands on her hips and declares, [meraxis.speech(Although you may have won that duel, I know that I'm really the most powerful! The next time we fight, I shall surely destroy you! Mwhahaha!)]

Spinning around on the spot, Meraxis strikes a dramatic pose and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(I shall return to the tavern now! There's no hard feelings between us because of this duel, right? Right. Now, witness my power!)]

Having been well and truly beaten, Meraxis staggers back and breathlessly pants, [meraxis.speech(No more... Y-You are victorious this day...)]

Not wanting to give her any time in which to make up an excuse as to why she can't pay up, you quickly remind Meraxis that she agreed to hand over her money should you win the duel. Letting out a high-pitched whine, the exhausted [meraxis.race] drops down onto her knees, before splaying her legs out to either side of her and putting on the most innocent expression she can muster. Pathetically pouting at you, she whines, [meraxis.speech(But mommy said that I could spend this allowance on buying something nice for myself... You wouldn't take that way from me, would you?)]

Even though you're almost certain that Meraxis is putting on this display as a way to manipulate you into letting her keep her money, she looks so sad and innocent that you find yourself wondering if you should just forget about the reward. Then again, you could always use some extra flames, and you're sure that Lyssieth would be happy to give her daughter some more money if she truly needed it...

Showing no sympathy, you demand that Meraxis hand over the money she'd promised as your reward. Letting out another pathetic, high-pitched whine Meraxis stands up and brushes herself down, before reluctantly handing all of her flames over to you. Pouting at you, she sighs, [meraxis.speech(I can't believe you actually took that from me... Anyway, listen to what I have to say...)]

You can't bring yourself to take Meraxis's money from her, and so you let out a sigh and tell her that she can keep it. Just as you suspected, Meraxis seems to have been putting on a show, for as soon as she hears that you're not going to take her money she immediately changes her expression and bounces to her feet, before quickly brushing herself down. Smiling at you, she exclaims, [meraxis.speech(Thanks, [pc.name]! You're the best nemesis! Anyway, listen to what I have to say!)]

Doing as you're asked, you listen as Meraxis places her hands on her hips and declares, [meraxis.speech(Although you may have won that duel, I know that I'm really the most powerful! The next time we fight, I shall surely destroy you! Mwhahaha!)]

Spinning around on the spot, Meraxis strikes a dramatic pose and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(I shall return to the tavern now! There's no hard feelings between us because of this duel, right? Right. Now, witness my power!)]

Having been well and truly beaten, Meraxis staggers back and breathlessly pants, [meraxis.speech(No more... Y-You are victorious this day...)]

[pc.Stepping] forwards, you remind Meraxis of your agreement, and ask her if she's ready to submit to your transformations. Letting out an indignant huff, the vanquished [meraxis.race] complains, [meraxis.speech(That's not fair... Y-You cheated... I shouldn't have to transform myself...)]

Deciding not to say anything in response to that, you simply wait and give Meraxis a disapproving look as she crosses her arms and pouts. After just a few seconds of silence, she cracks and lets out a deep, drawn-out sigh, before relenting and saying, [meraxis.speech(Fine... I suppose I did agree to it... But I only said that you could get me to transform one part of my body, remember? And no stuff with cocks or turning me into an incubus!)]

Tapping her foot on the ground, the chuuni [meraxis.race] waits to hear what part of her you want to transform...

Changing your mind as you see how unwilling Meraxis is to be transformed, you let out a sigh and tell her that she doesn't need to transform herself after all. Surprised and delighted at your decision, the chuuni [meraxis.race] flashes you a big smile and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(Really?! Thanks, [pc.name]! I-I mean... Mwhahaha! You are foolish to be so merciful, my nemesis! Now tremble before me and listen to what I have to say!)]

Wanting her to focus her transformation on her ass, you tell Meraxis to turn around and lift up her cape so that you can get a good look at her rear-end. Furiously blushing, the embarrassed [meraxis.race] makes some half-hearted protests, but nevertheless does as you say. Turning around and lifting her cape, she allows you to look at her small ass and girly hips.

Confirming to yourself that Meraxis's ass is far too small, you tell her that you've decided upon her transformation. After you've told her that you want her to make her ass and hips a lot bigger, she turns her head back and exclaims, [meraxis.speech(I'm not making them too big, ok?! I can't believe that my nemesis is such a pervert...)]

With her cheeks still burning bright red, Meraxis starts to focus her demonic self-transformative powers into her butt, and you can't help but smile in appreciation as you watch her ass and hips start to grow bigger...

The next time we duel, I shall surely destroy you for making me look like this!)]

As she's not yet used to the extra size and weight of her rear end, however, she ends up tripping over her feet and stumbling into you, ass-first. Catching the unbalanced [meraxis.race] before she falls to the ground, you end up with her plump ass cheeks bumping directly into #IF(pc.isTaur()) you. #ELSE your groin. #ENDIF

Despite her words, however, you detect more than a little arousal in her voice, but before you can comment on this she points her finger at you and shouts, [meraxis.speech(Y-You shall remain silent! Tremble before me and listen to what I have to say!)]

The next time we duel, I shall destroy you!)]

N-Now Tremble before me and listen to what I have to say!)]
